@Nitin: I was using the one you get from Callisto RC1a (installed via the update manager by selecting Java Development, Web Standard Tools and adding the required features). And no, I couldn't find any info on which class was not found.
Resolving as WORKSFORME; there doesn't seem to be a problem with Europa.
